sections.heading: acts; how attested.The act or acts of such corporations for all legal purposes shall be attested by the principal officer and the secretary under the seal of such corporation

sections.text:
21-611.Corporate acts; how attested.

The act or acts of such corporations for all legal purposes shall be attested by the principal officer and the secretary under the seal of such corporation.

SourceLaws 1897, c. 20, § 4, p. 186;R.S.1913, § 611;C.S.1922, § 505;C.S.1929, § 24-608;R.S.1943, § 21-611.
